description: A frontend HTML page implementing a database viewer UI with embedded CSS and JavaScript for fetching and displaying database, table, and data information.

methods.name: loadDatabases
methods.description: Fetches the list of databases and populates the sidebar.

methods.name: refreshDatabases
methods.description: Refreshes the database list and resets current selection.

methods.name: toggleDatabase
methods.description: Expands or collapses a database to show or hide its tables, and loads tables when expanded.

methods.name: loadTables
methods.description: Fetches the list of tables for a selected database.

methods.name: loadTableData
methods.description: Fetches and displays data from a selected table.

methods.name: renderTable
methods.description: Renders fetched data into an HTML table within the UI.

methods.name: renderCell
methods.description: Creates HTML for individual table cell, handling objects, nulls, and long strings.

methods.name: expandCell
methods.description: Expands or collapses a cell to show full content if truncated.
